rules_text:
Menace, reach
When Surfacing Horripede enters, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“I don't know what hell this thing crawled out of, but I'm sure as silver sending it back.”
—Borean, slayer-cathar[/i]
